menu.name: new_table
menu.title: Define New Table
menu.text: All units are defined using SI units (meters, kilograms, etc). The defaults define my 7-foot table.
If you pick a pocketless table type, you can ignore all pocket-related parameters.
menu.subtitle: General

dropdown.name: type
Type
dropdown.description: Let's start simple. What kind of table are we talking? Pockets or no pockets?

entry.name: cushion_height
cushion height
entry.description: The height of where the ball contacts the cushion, measured from the table surface

menu.subtitle: Corner pockets

entry.name: corner_pocket_width
corner pocket width
entry.description: The point-to-point distance defining the mouth of the pocket

entry.name: corner_pocket_angle
corner pocket angle
entry.description: The opening angle of the pocket (degrees). When 0, the pocket walls run parallel.

entry.name: corner_pocket_depth
corner pocket depth
entry.description: The shelf depth of the pocket

entry.name: corner_pocket_radius
corner pocket radius
entry.description: The radius of the corner pocket holes

entry.name: corner_jaw_radius
corner jaw radius
entry.description: How rounded the corner pocket jaws? Make larger to resemble snooker/chinese billiards

entry.description: The shelf depth of the pocket
